availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to Rebecca Raily Leach in Ohio County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1823. Father of John Leach, Nancy Leach, Althea Leach, Sarah Leach, James Leach, William Leach, and Amanda Leach. Farmer in Ohio County in 1850. Farmer in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 1, p. 21B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Cromwell, p. 688.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 000494956.
